sourcesContent:
Activation Successful!

Your account has been successfully activated.

Activation Failed!

{{ message }}

Type your activation code

 import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; import {AuthentificationService} from "../../../services/services/authentification.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-activate-account', templateUrl: './activate-account.component.html', styleUrls: ['./activate-account.component.css'] }) export class ActivateAccountComponent { message = ''; isOk = true; submitted = false; constructor( private router: Router, private authService: AuthentificationService ) {} }
